subject: Coaches and Managers
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Jim Leavitt, a former South Florida coach, sued the university over his firing, seeking to recover some of the $9.5 million left on his seven-year contract.
snippet: Jim Leavitt, a former South Florida coach, sued the university over his firing, seeking to recover some of the $9.5 million left on his seven-year contract.
